subject: Basketball
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: After he was barely able to walk after Game 4, Kobe Bryant’s ferocious dunk against the Hornets in Game 5, say some sportswriters, has recharged the Lakers’ season.
snippet: After he was barely able to walk after Game 4, Kobe Bryant’s ferocious dunk against the Hornets in Game 5, say some sportswriters, has recharged the Lakers’ season.
